New Records: Dorian Finney-Smith had 17 points (6 of 10 and a Nets career-high-tying 5 of 8 from deep) with six boards in 28 minutes.
Key Match Events: Nic Claxton finally got his first start of the season, after missing the whole preseason.
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Jordi Fernandez downplayed the injury of Noah Clowney, stating that he had a clean MRI and was just bruised and sore.
Post-Match Reflections: Nic Claxton expressed optimism after his first start of the season, stating that he was 100% and ready to play.
Dorian Finney-Smith was happy to make some shots in the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ben Simmons was rested on the tail end of a back-to-back to manage his back.
Others: The Nets big man Noah Clowney is hopeful of playing their next game in Boston despite a sore hip.
